attributes.action: Give All Disabled Students Studying In London A Freedom Pass
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If I'm a student studying in London, it would mean spending over half the year there, yet I'm not entitled to a freedom pass just because I spend the remainder of the year in another city, living at home. How is this fair?

Please sign if you think this is wrong and think we should get a freedom pass same as people who live in London.
